alert.note: Alert for Pleasants; Tyler (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 1:58PM EST until January 03 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following counties, Pleasants and Tyler. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Middle Island Creek continues to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 146 PM EST, the automated gauge on Middle Island Creek near Little showed the creek has risen above flood stage with minor flooding likely occurring. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... St. Marys, Arvilla and Point Lookout. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report Severe Weather to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely. You may also report severe weather by posting your report to the Charleston West Virginia National Weather Service Facebook Page, or by using the Twitter Hashtag, NWSRLX.
